summary: This is an email chain from March 25, 2021, between a U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) contractor and other USANYS personnel, coordinating a meeting to discuss scanning data related to the case 'US v. Epstein' for loading into the Relativity e-discovery platform.

events.title: Coordination for US v. Epstein Data Meeting
events.description: Email exchange to schedule a call between a USANYS contractor, a vendor (PAE), and USANYS personnel to discuss scanning data for the Epstein case to be loaded into Relativity.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email chain from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) dated March 25, 2021.
The subject is 'US v. Epstein', indicating ongoing case-related work over a year after Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The correspondence concerns technical logistics for loading scanned case data into the Relativity e-discovery platform, involving a contractor and a vendor named PAE.
All personal names in the 'To' and 'From' fields are redacted, indicated by angle brackets or placeholders.
